content:
I tried to find an image I recently uploaded. The Uploaded files list didn't seem to have any obvious initial sorting. It wasn't until I stumbled over this PR that I realized clicking on one of the fields would sort the files accordingly. This was because hovering over the fields didn't give me any visual feedback that these are clickable.

I suggest

  • initially sort all files by date
  • make the info titles more button-ish. Provide a visual feedback on hovering and clicking.
Feel free to create an issue here. I'm actually kind of surprised it looks as nice as it does, since I don't think we've ever given this UI a ton of attention. But it could use a bit more polish.
